#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main(void) {
	long long int t,x,y,xs,ys,ans;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--) {
		scanf("%lld %lld %lld %lld",&x,&y,&xs,&ys);
		if(y==x)
		  printf("(%lld,0)\n",x);
		else if(ys>=xs)
		  printf("not possible\n");
		else 
		{
			ans=(y-x)/(xs-ys); 
			ans=x+ans*xs	; 
			printf ("(%lld,0)\n",ans)  ; 
			
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
